@ sk897halden

Uh, no. Don't YOU try to trick anyone.

This IS the file from Muffin's torrent. Only reason why your torrent is bigger is because you were dumb enough to leave his .rar package in your torrent along with the extracted contents. Padding the torrent out to twice the size it needed to be. Maybe if you had deleted that part, you could have gotten away with it. 

Many of us aren't stupid, and know what crc32 & md5 checksums are and how to read them. Funny how the ones in yours matches the ones in his.

Seriously, if you're going to have the nerve to steal credit for other people's work and try to lie about it, you should at the very least not be such a fucking moron as to leave the original package you took the files from in your torrent.

Also, don't be so insulting to the rest of the internet by trying to lie at all. Do you really believe everyone else is just as stupid as you? Do you really believe that no one could ever possibly check/compare files? 

Dumb ass thieving retard.
